file_content.text: Override engaged. You can fire the Seekers.
Whatever you're gonna do, do it quick. There's an awful lot of movement outside these gates.
This is your choice, Garith. If your men are willing to stand guard here, I won't stop you.
Garith's call, not mine.
We'll get the prisoners to safety and update the Supreme Chancellor. Meet you back on your ship.
Most are healthy, though they could use a solid meal. It's the prisoners who've been here longest I'm worried about.
Once we get them out of here, they'll receive the best medical care in the Republic.
No need to worry now.
I couldn't help overhearing--Garith's loved ones were among the first dead.
Including Garith's family.
Does this disease affect other species? We don't want to start another outbreak.
Have we been infected?
You're safe, Master Jedi. The disease only affects Bothans.
Hunker down? We're in the middle of Imperial territory. You've got to get out before they send reinforcements.
This is a brave gesture, Garith, but are you sure you've thought it through?
Are you sure about this?
You don't have to fight alone. The Protectors can make it back without me.
I can stay with you.
This is suicide. You and your men wouldn't last five minutes on your own.
You'll be slaughtered!
Give us a little credit. We brought down that Imp bomb squadron, didn't we?
But Jastra was so strong. And Irys and Mak... they were just children.
That disease is brutal. They went quick, if it helps.
How are we coming, Audra?
They've contracted Torolis fever. The Imperials provided no treatment whatsoever--hundreds died in the first outbreak.
Poor man. We're in time to save the rest, I hope?
I've done what I can, but it'll be days before they're well enough to move. We'll have to hunker down here until then.
Protectors = take sick anyway // Doctor Kantos = help prisoners survive?
We couldn't just bring the sick ones and hope for the best?
Are we sure the sick can't be moved? I've kept people alive in worse conditions.
Victory is unlikely. We should evacuate everyone now, including the sick.
A foolish gesture. Load the sick prisoners onto the shuttles and be done with it.
Recommendation: I suggest evacuating everyone now, master. If the sick do not survive, nature has run its course.
This is a dreadful place, master. Surely the sick prisoners would rather leave now?
If the Empire wants Camp Sovereign back, make them fight for it.
The resistance can stay.
I don't care if these people are foaming at the mouth. We're taking all of them with us.
Load the sick prisoners.
Captain, let me stay. We'll hide in the command center. I just need a few days....
Skies are clear, Master Jedi. Come out and join the party.
I know it's been a long fight. But we have to protect these people until they're well.
We can handle them.
If it was just us, I'd agree. But we've got hundreds of healthy prisoners to worry about, too.
Every Imperial in Camp Sovereign is dead. What makes you think they'll send more?
Reinforcements?
You overwhelmed their forces here, but the Empire will raze this place before they call it lost.
We can't risk everyone's lives for a few sick Bothans who might end up dying anyway.
Garith's right on this.
What are you two suggesting? That we just leave the sick ones here?
Get the rest of the prisoners on your shuttles. My men and I will stay and guard the sick until they can be moved.
And what if another Sith Lord shows up? Or there's a crisis somewhere else on Bothawui? We can't waste you here.
If it means these people get back to their families... yeah, I'm sure.
Say we evacuated the sick prisoners now. What are their chances?
It's already touch and go for most. Now you want them to stand up, board a shuttle, and get jounced around for hours?
These people will make it. That's a promise.
I'm staying. Anyone who wants to leave had better go now.
Defensive positions, then. We'll hold out here until Doctor Kantos says otherwise.
The decision's been made, Audra. Get the sick on board and do what you can for them.
Shouldn't be more than a day or two. I'll find my own way back to your ship. Good luck.
